MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: # This will show you the subscriptions under the account. azure account list # Use the subscription name to select the one you want to work on. azure account set <subscription name>

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Install and Configure the Azure CLI
Install and Configure the Azure CLI

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: azure role assignment list -g group1 --upn <user email> -o Owner

MarkdownFencedCodeBlock.code_block: azure ad user list azure ad user show azure ad group list azure ad group show azure ad group member list azure ad sp list azure ad sp show

CodeSpanItem.ItemValue: azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Reader
azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Reader
PS C:\> azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Contributor -g group1
PS C:\> azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Contributor -g group1
azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Owner -g group1 -r Microsoft.Web/sites -u site1
azure role assignment create --upn <user's email> -o Owner -g group1 -r Microsoft.Web/sites -u site1

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: PS C:\> azure group list PS C:\> azure resource list
